name: Pesky Foxies Patrol
description:
Game made for the Extra Credits Jam #6, theme: 'Take Care'.

In this game you need to take care of the foxes in the woods before they get to the chicken farm.

It's up to you to decide if trying to send them away gently, or just whack 'em.

Third Party Assets
  • Mixamo.com
  • Synty Studio Asset Packs
  • Animal Variety Pack
  • Advanced Magic FX 12 & 13
  • gamesounds.xyz
  • Soundly
  • Xelu Icons
  • Dafont for custom font
